title: A Hot Day and a Movie
story: Wow! It sure is hot today. Yes, it is. It's probably 90 degrees. Did you want to go somewhere? Sure! How about a movie? A movie would be great, Lisa. Yes. It will be cool there. Going to a movie is a great idea. Anything to cool us down, Alice.
summary: Two friends discuss the hot weather and decide to go watch a movie to cool down.
image: Two friends sitting in a movie theater with popcorn and drinks.
